channel.title: Roads Go Ever On
channel.description:
The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit written by J.R.R. Tolkien. Music composed by Howard Shore. The Lord of the Rings Soundscape Audiobook narrated, produced, and edited by Phil Dragash. The Hobbit Soundscape Audiobook narrated, produced, and edited by Bluefax. Art by Jian Guo.
Links: https://linktr.ee/lotr_audiobooks Contact: roadsgoeveron@proton.me

channel.itunes:subtitle: Phil Dragash's and Bluefax's Soundscape Audiobooks
